project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion Command-Line Tool
project_plan.description: Implement a command-line tool in Python to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion function for Celsius to Fahrenheit and Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion function for Fahrenheit to Celsius and Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion function for Kelvin to Celsius and Fahrenheit
Create user interface for command-line input and output
Write tests for each of the conversion functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
